entry.title: Reconsidering github
entry.summary: In an email conversation between Troy Benjegerdes and Wladimir, Troy expressed his concern about Bitcoin's dependency on Github, which he considers an unknown attack surface. He suggested that those who run their own servers will migrate to higher quality alternatives if the issue persists. In response, Wladimir asked if Troy was volunteering to run a web-accessible mirror of the Bitcoin repositories. The context highlights the need for secure alternatives to Github for Bitcoin's sustainability.
